headline: Emerson Addresses Power Industry’s AI-Driven Demand Surge
summary: The power industry is experiencing unprecedented demand growth, driven largely by data centers and artificial intelligence (AI) applications. This surge is creating both opportunities and challenges for utilities, equipment manufacturers, and the broader power generation ecosystem. As a guest on The POWER Podcast, Seth Harris, growth director for Emerson’s Power business in North America, discussed […]

headline: Emerson Electric Stock: Is EMR Underperforming the Industrials Sector?
summary: Although Emerson Electric has underperformed the industrial sector over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.
